TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClientWebSocket extends System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocket implements class System.IDisposable
Public Class ClientWebSocket Inherits WebSocket Implements IDisposable
public ref class ClientWebSocket : System::Net::WebSockets::WebSocket, IDisposable
type ClientWebSocket = class inherit WebSocket interface IDisposable

summary.span: 提供連接至 WebSocket 服務的用戶端。

span.span: Provides a client for connecting to WebSocket services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 部分類別和類別中的項目Windows 7、 Windows Vista SP2 和 Windows Server 2008 上支援命名空間。Some of the classes and class elements in the namespace are supported on Windows 7, Windows Vista SP2, and Windows Server 2008. 不過，Windows 8 和 Windows Server 2012 上支援的用戶端和伺服器 WebSockets 只有 public 的實作。However, the only public implementations of client and server WebSockets are supported on Windows 8 and Windows Server 2012. 中的類別項目Windows 7、 Windows Vista SP2 和 Windows Server 2008 支援的命名空間都是抽象類別的項目。The class elements in the namespace that are supported on Windows 7, Windows Vista SP2, and Windows Server 2008 are abstract class elements. 這可讓繼承，並將這些抽象類別的類別和類別的用戶端 Websocket 的實際實作的項目延伸的應用程式開發人員。This allows an application developer to inherit and extend these abstract class classes and class elements with an actual implementation of client WebSockets.

summary.span: 中止連線並取消任何暫止 IO 作業。

span.span: Aborts the connection and cancels any pending IO operations.

remarks.span: `ClientWebSocket`無法重複使用之後它就會中止。

span.span: The `ClientWebSocket` cannot be reused once it is aborted.

A description of the close status.

param.name: cancellationToken

summary.span: 以非同步作業方式關閉 執行個體。

span.span: Close the instance as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回物件之後，才會完成執行個體為封閉式。The returned object will complete after the instance is closed.

summary.span: 以非同步作業方式關閉 執行個體的輸出。

span.span: Close the output for the instance as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回物件上，會完成輸出之後執行個體為封閉式。The returned object will complete after the output on the instance is closed.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task ConnectAsync (Uri uri, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task ConnectAsync(class System.Uri uri, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
public: System::Threading::Tasks::Task ^ ConnectAsync(Uri ^ uri, System::Threading::CancellationToken cancellationToken);
member this.ConnectAsync : Uri * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task

param.name: uri
param.span: 要連接之目標 WebSocket 伺服器的 URI。

span.span: The URI of the WebSocket server to connect to.

param.name: cancellationToken
param.span: 這個取消語彙基元是用來傳播應該取消作業的通知。

span.span: A cancellation token used to propagate notification that the operation should be canceled.

summary.span: 以非同步作業的方式連接至 WebSocket 伺服器。

span.span: Connect to a WebSocket server as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法起始遠端網路目的地的 WebSocket 交握，並接著會交涉子通訊協定。The method initiates the WebSocket handshake with a remote network destination, and then negotiates the sub-protocol. 對於一般的 WebSocket 連線，使用`ws://`uri 中的配置。For plain WebSocket connections, use the `ws://` scheme in the uri. 對於透過 TLS/SSL 的安全 WebSocket 連線，使用`wss://`配置。For secure WebSocket connections over TLS/SSL, use the `wss://` scheme. 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回物件會在完成之後的連線要求執行個體已完成。The returned object will complete after the connect request on the instance has completed.

span.span: The buffer to receive the response.

summary.span: 將 上的資料當成非同步作業接收。

span.span: Receives data on as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回物件上，會完成接收要求之後執行個體已完成。The returned object will complete after the receive request on the instance has completed. 只有一個傳送，另一個接收的每個支援以平行方式的物件。Exactly one send and one receive is supported on each object in parallel.
